TopicTitle: Asymmetric Thrust inspired by "2010: The Year We Make Contact" in Part 5 of my Tylo rescue - "Project Overkill" started in beta 0.23

Articles.Content:
I promised to get  Part 5 up in a couple of weeks a couple of months ago...
 


Check out the earlier episodes in this Mission Report/Cinematic/Comedy  in the Project Overkill playlist.  No cheats in the gameplay part, some in the cutscenes, and plenty of Quick Saves.

This rescue mission came about due to poor planning in my  attempt at doing a Jool Grand Tour.

If you just want to see the money shot, here's a summary and GIF.

Spoiler

The Prometheus needs to get to Tylo to deliver a Kethane ISRU rover to re-fuel Bill's lander.  Due to mistakes being made, it's long range antenna was lost so RemoteTech control from Discovery wouldn't work, requiring mating the craft as a solution.  The problem is, they each have different Thrust to Weight Ratios.
https://gfycat.com/scarceflawedbengaltiger
